content: Hi everyone, So here is an idea I think would be fun to do and at the same time, Help us to support each other, for our individual growth on the forum. Impotant Notice:-we all are free to post comments, but when posting a count down to your next rank, Make sure to read the rules carefully and follow them, doing otherwise will have your post reported and possibly deleted by the Moderator.And also note that this program is for those that have achieved the required Activity to move to the next rank, but are lacking in Merit(s), if your have achieved the Merit(s) required for your next rank and lacks enough Activity, receiving more Merit(s) through to this program won't help you rank up immediately, but will in the long run though.IN MERIT- POST A COUNT DOWN TO YOUR NEXT RANK.Description:-This is announcing or posting -(and keeping post constantly updated)- the number of Merit(s) left to get you into your next rank.Benefits:-If you post the number of merit(s) left for you to move to the next rank here, Merit sources, Any one and Everyone watching this topic with lots of sMerit to share might decide to take a look at your post history, to find posts that are Merit worthy to Merit so as to help you ascend.Note:-Please note that you stand a better chance of being Assisted/Merited into your next rank if --you have little amount of Merit(s) left to ascend to your next rank.If your posts are of utmost quality.RULESThis program is open to all Ranks except Legendary, who are already Legends and have no other rank to attain, But Legendary ranks are free to comment/support/correct/take action on those that fail to follow the rules here. Minimum required Activity to participate in this program is 50+, any account making count down post here with less than 50 activity level will have his post reported to moderator and possibly deleted. To avoid or minimize spam, it is henceforth required that You must be a jr member rank to make a count down post on this thread - 1 merit is not so hard to earn on your own I believe.For orderliness, and to differentiate Count down Posts from ordinary comments, You are mandated to use the format below to make/create your count down post.Code:[b]My Countdown to _____ Rank[/b][b][i]Number of Merit(s) left: ?[/i][/b]It is mandatory that You must be less than 25 merits from next rank to make a count down post on this thread. As you get Merit(s), Try as much as possible to keep your count down post updated with the current number(s) of Merit left to shift you to your next rank.In order to bring spam down to its barest minimum, especially from Newbies, Only one count down post is required per user, you can always edit your count down post for your next rank if you get upgraded, that is, if your are a Full member rank and make a count down post to Senior member rank, once you get to Senior member rank, you can edit your count down post for your next rank which is Hero member rank.We know you would like your count down post to be on the last page of the thread for better visibility, but making a countdown post on every page is Spam and that's not so cool, So you are required to only ask (make a count down post) once in a 7 days period.After you have achieved your new rank, DO NOT USE THIS THREAD AS A PLACE TO ANNOUNCE YOUR NEW RANK, you can announce your new rank on Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!Failure to Adhere and comply with the above rules will result to a total boycott of your request, and you stand a chance of being reported to the mod for spamming. Rules are likely to be added or changed, but for now, make sure to read the rules above and obey them.
